viewContainers.activitybar.title: CPH Judge
views.cph-judge-view-container.name: Results
commands.runTestCases.title: Run Testcases
commands.submitToCodeForces.title: Submit to CodeForces
configuration.title: Competitive Programming Helper
configuration.properties.general.saveLoc: Location where generated .tcs and .bin files will be saved. Leave empty to save the file in the source file directory. Use this to clean up your folders.
configuration.properties.general.timeOut: The time in ms for which a testcase is run before it is killed ( timed-out ).
configuration.properties.general.hideStd: Ignore and don't show stderror when compilation exit code is zero.
configuration.properties.general.ignoreS: If enabled, non-empty standard error will not result in testcase failing.
configuration.properties.language.c.Args: Space seperated additional flags passed to gcc ( for C ) while compiling your file. Example '-O2 -Wall'
configuration.properties.language.c.Subm: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for c
configuration.properties.language.c.Comm: Command used to compile .c files. Example 'gcc', 'gcc-10', 'clang', etc.
configuration.properties.language.cpp.Ar: Space seperated additional flags passed to g++ ( for C++ ) while compiling your file. Example '-Wmaybe-uninitialized -std=c++14'
configuration.properties.language.cpp.Su: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for cpp
configuration.properties.language.cpp.Co: Command used to compile .cpp files. Example 'g++', 'g++-10', 'clang++', etc.
configuration.properties.language.python: Space seperated additional flags passed to python while compiling your file. Example '-Wignore -u'
The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for python
Command used to run python files. Example 'py', 'python3', 'pypy3', etc.
configuration.properties.language.rust.A: Space seperated additional flags passed to rustc while compiling your file. Example '-O2 --verbose'
configuration.properties.language.rust.S: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for rust
configuration.properties.language.rust.C: Command used to comp ile rust files.
configuration.properties.language.go.Arg: Space seperated additional flags passed to go while compiling your file. Example '-gcflags=-S'
configuration.properties.language.go.Sub: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for go
configuration.properties.language.haskel: Space seperated additional flags passed to go while compiling your file.
The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for haskell
configuration.properties.language.java.A: Space seperated additional flags passed to javac while compiling your file. Example '-verbose'
configuration.properties.language.java.S: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for java
configuration.properties.language.java.C: Command used to compile java files.
configuration.properties.language.js.Arg: Space seperated additional flags passed to node (for JavaScript) while compiling your file. Example '--abort-on-uncaught-exception'
configuration.properties.language.js.Sub: The compiler chosen in the drop down during Codeforces submission for js
configuration.properties.general.firstTi: A welcome message is shown when you run a testcase for the first time. This setting is updated automatically after the first message is shown.
configuration.properties.general.default: The default language for problems imported via Competitive Companion (None will give option to select language on importing problem every time)
configuration.properties.general.menuCho: Space separated languages, in top to bottom order, shown in menu when a problem is imported via Competitive Companion. Example 'java python' would show java on top, followed by python.
configuration.properties.general.useShor: Use a short ID for problem file generated ( like 144C ) instead of the complete problem name for codeforces problems
configuration.properties.general.retainW: Keep the webview active even when it's hidden. May improve performance but may cause some rendering issues.
configuration.properties.general.default: The path of the template that will be loaded when a new file of the default language is created by Competitive Companion
configuration.properties.general.autoSho: Automatically show the judge view when opening a file that has a problem associated with it
